problem.markdown:
This is an example problem with an attached hinter. Specific hints and the Element have been manually set for this hinter.
The generic hint is "Try checking for spelling mistakes". A specific hint is set for the incorrect answer "michigann".
>>Which US state has Lansing as its capital?<<
= Michigan
[explanation] Lansing is the capital of Michigan, although it is not Michigan's largest city, or even the seat of the county in which it resides. [explanation]
problem.p: This is an example problem with an attached hinter. Specific hints and the Element have been manually set for this hinter.
The generic hint is "Try checking for spelling mistakes".
A specific hint is set for the incorrect answer "michigann".
Which US state has Lansing as its capital?

textline.label: Which US state has Lansing as its capital?

div.p: Lansing is the capital of Michigan, although it is not Michigan's largest city, or even the seat of the county in which it resides.
